main.name: Joy Rinonos
main.description: Computer Science major, and East Asian Studies and Studio Art minor interested in UX/UI Design.
main.bio: I'm currently a second year Computer Science major at the University of Virginia. I'm most interested in pursuing UX/UI Design in my career, but open to trying new things and learning new skills. Outside of school I'm actively involved in Aerial Dance Club at UVA and the Sigma Chapter of the alpha Kappa Delta Phi Sorority Inc., at UVa.
main.contactmessage: I'd love to speak with you! You can find my contact information below
